attributes.action: Influence the British Olympic committe to utilise the historic home internationals to decide which country from within the UK is entered as the British and Northern Irish team at the 2014 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the British Olympic committee have chosen to ignore the concerns that a UK team would compromise the various home nations football associations.Home International to chose Nation that represents us.
